Interface Plot3D

All Known Implementing Classes:
JavaFXPlot3D
public interface Plot3D
3D plotting interface for JScience.

Surface plots, 3D scatter, mesh visualization.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)
